name.en: The molecular pathology of head and neck cancer

department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系系統生物與生物資訊碩士班
department.en: Master Program in Systems Biology and Bioinformatics, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 腫瘤分類的基礎正在從形態學分類轉向分子分類。本課程是以分子生物學的角度，瞭解人類頭頸癌症的惡性化的基因基礎, 選修學生可以更深入了解現今癌症醫學的進步。並在此一基礎上, 思考如何在後基因體時代,開發創新的分子癌症診斷技術以及更有效的標靶治療方式。
goal.en: The course is designed to teach students to understand the molecular pathology of human head and neck cancers. Students can learn advanced knowledge in modern pathology and diagnostic approaches of cancer from the curricula and think about how to develop novel and precise diagnostic approaches in the post genome era.

outline.ch:
1.Introduction: pathology of human cancers
2.Methodology-tissue processing
3.Methodology-molecular diagnosis
4.Methodology-advanced technology
5.Methodology-bioinformatics
6.Molecular basis of head and neck cancer-genetic aberrations
7.Molecular basis of head and neck cancer-viruses
8.Student report-mid-1
9.Student report-mid-2
10.Oral cancer
11.Oropharyngeal cancer
12.Nasopharyngeal cancer
13.Hypopharyngeal cancer
14.Laryngeal cancer
15.salivary gland cancer
16.Student report-final-1
17.Student report-final-2
18.Conclusion
